articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Meeting of Information Workers of Whole Army
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Meeting of Information Workers of Whole Army
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Thursday had a photo session with the participants in the meeting of information workers of the whole army.
					When he appeared in the photographing site, all the participants enthusiastically welcomed him with rousing cheers of "hurrah!," looking up to him, who is leading the all-out action for defending the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation to victory after making a final decision to demonstrate the resolute will of the KPA with practical military actions to cope with the grave situation where the U.S. anti-DPRK hostile acts have reached the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					Acknowledging their enthusiastic cheers, he extended a warm salute to all information workers who are registering great achievements in improving and strengthening the ideological work in the KPA, bearing deep in mind the noble mission and duty they assumed before the times and the revolution.
					
					The meeting marked a historic occasion in providing a new landmark for bringing about a great turn in the ideological work of the KPA as required by the modeling of the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he said, adding that at the meeting the enthusiasm of information workers to remain loyal to the WPK's line on turning the KPA into the army strong in ideology was fully manifested. 
					
					Warmly congratulating the participants in the meeting on having successfully carried out their work amid high enthusiasm and earnest participation, he had a photo taken with them.
					
					He expressed expectation and conviction that all the information workers of the KPA would conduct more dynamic frontline-style information and agitation activities to make the hearts of the KPA soldiers burn with the towering resentment at the brigandish U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors, the will to annihilate enemies and ardent desire for national reunification.
					
					Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Kyong Ok, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song and Jo Kyong Chol.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter sent by Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on behalf of the participants of the 17th seminar of world political parties on building a new society on March 16.
					The letter said Kim Jong Un is adding glory to socialist Korea, Songun Korea before the whole world, the legacies handed down by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to posterity, possessed of extraordinary wisdom, outstanding political caliber and noble popular personality.
					
					The world progressives are now struck with admiration at the feats Kim Jong Un has performed by resolutely frustrating the moves of the imperialist allied forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK and leading the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people only to victory and glory, thereby placing the dignity of the Korean nation at the highest level. The letter recalled that Kim Jong Un is highly praised as a man of the year in the world.
					
					The landmark events taking place in the DPRK are instilling deep conviction and great courage into the world progressive political parties and people in their struggle for independence against imperialism and for socialism, it noted, adding:
					
					The participants of the seminar wish Kim Jong Un good health and happiness, expressing belief that the WPK and the Korean people under his wise leadership would bring about a turning phase in the efforts to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve national reunification in significant 2013, the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Congratulations to Slovenian PM

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Issues Statement
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Issues Statement
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) on Thursday issued the following statement:
					Shortly ago, the U.S. and south Korean puppet group cooked up a "joint plan to cope with the provocation of a local war," escalating the danger of a war. 
					
					The joint plan signed by the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea and the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea calls on the U.S. forces to automatically get involved in the conflict in case of the north's "provocation of a local war" and thus jointly counter it together with the south Korean puppet army. 
					
					The plan for aggression elaborates on the contents of the operation and proposals on joint counteraction. 
					
					In this regard, the south Korean puppet group claims that a legal and institutional mechanism has been provided to ensure the U.S. forces' automatic involvement in the local war, the U.S. agreed with the principle on striking not only the base of provocations and supporting and commanding forces and that it has become possible to make a prompt and decisive counteraction against any provocation by the north. 
					
					All these facts brought the U.S. hypocrisy to daylight and proved that the U.S. and south Korea are the root cause and chieftain of the provocation of a local war. 
					
					The above-said joint plan is a very dangerous document for invading the DPRK and an open declaration of a war of aggression against it. 
					
					Any conflict on the Korean Peninsula will immediately lead to an all-out war and a nuclear war, not confined to a local war.
					
					The Armistice Agreement, the north-south agreements on nonaggression and the joint declaration on denuclearization of the peninsula were totally nullified due to the grave provocations of the U.S. and the puppet group. Consequently, there is no  mechanism to deter a war.
					
					Worse still, the U.S. and puppet warmongers are openly hatching sinister plots to bring down the statues of the great Generalissimos and monuments to them, symbols of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. In order to counter these moves, the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army has already declared military actions against the U.S. mainland and the bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in Hawaii, Guam and the Pacific, to say nothing of the military targets and enemy ruling institutions in south Korea.
					
					Have the U.S. and puppet warmongers imagined what catastrophic consequences to be entailed by the "joint plan for countering the provocation of a local war" at this time?
					
					They are seriously mistaken if they try to threaten the DPRK with such farce.
					
					The hatred and resentment of the DPRK's army and people are running high.
					
					The signing of the plan will increase the justice of practical military actions of the DPRK which keeps not only Chongwadae in Seoul but the White House in Washington within the coordinates of high precision strikes. It is a foolish dream for the puppet group to seek a way out by clinging to coattails of the U.S.
					
					The U.S. nuclear umbrella will never help protect the puppet group as it will prove ineffective in face of the powerful nuclear strikes of the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK's army and people which launched a final sacred war to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of its supreme leadership will make a clean sweep of the U.S., the ringleader of aggression, and the pro-U.S. puppet warmongers from the surface of the earth.

articles.title: Pomminryon Calls for Waging Solidarity Movement for Conclusion of Peace Treaty
articles.content:
Pomminryon Calls for Waging Solidarity Movement for Conclusion of Peace Treaty
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued the following joint statement Thursday:
					A touch-and-go situation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the unwarranted UN "resolutions on sanctions" masterminded by the U.S. and its followers in succession and their reckless north-targeted war exercises.
					
					As recognized by the public at home and abroad, the north's satellite launch was a legitimate one in compliance with international law on the peaceful use of outer space, and it is a full-fledged right of all the sovereign states to conquer space.
					
					The north's underground nuclear test was also a legitimate measure for defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation and protecting peace from the U.S. and its allies' persistent moves to isolate and stifle the country and their undisguised nuclear threats.
					
					It is illogical for the U.S. to assert that it can carry out nuclear tests, launch missiles and pose nuclear threats while the north can not launch satellites for peaceful purposes nor conduct a nuclear test for self-defence.
					
					The U.S. has even wantonly violated the sovereignty and dignity of an independent state by applying "sanctions" on the DPRK under those pretexts, a blatant challenge to international law.
					
					This reveals the U.S. gangster-like nature of brandishing nuclear weapons to stifle any country which it considers a stumbling block in realizing its design of holding world hegemony.
					
					The joint military exercises being under way in the sky and land and seas of south Korea with the involvement of huge nuclear strike means are a dangerous nuclear war rehearsal aimed to exterminate the Korean nation in view of their nature, scale and program.
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean military warmongers' reckless war provocation moves nullified the Korean Armistice Agreement and rendered the north-south agreements on non-aggression completely defunct, pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					The north, south and overseas headquarters of Pomminryon state as follows reflecting the will of the nation to resolutely foil the reckless war moves of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad, and defend peace: 
					
					The U.S. and south Korean military warmongers should immediately stop reckless north-targeted war exercises that can bring a nuclear holocaust to the nation.
					
					The U.S. should clearly know that it no longer has the monopoly of nuclear weapons.
					
					If a war breaks out again on this land by an accidental military conflict under the conditions where both belligerent parties possess nukes, that will lead to a nuclear war incomparable with that fought in the 1950s and the U.S. lying across the ocean can never be safe, either.
					
					All the Koreans wishing for the bright future of the nation should turn out against the reckless north-targeted nuclear war drills of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers who seek to devastate the country and inflict a nuclear holocaust on the nation.
					
					The U.S. and its followers should at once withdraw the unreasonable UN "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. brigandish act by which it fabricated "resolutions on sanctions" by abusing the UN and provoked a war under that pretext will no longer work on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The Korean nation is not such a weak nation as it used to be in the past and it is different from those countries which threw themselves on the mercy of big powers in fear of their nuclear threats.
					
					The U.S. should clearly face up to the reality and apologize for its farce of tightening "sanctions" by abusing the UN.
					
					Let all the Koreans at home and abroad more vigorously wage the massive movement for the conclusion of a peace treaty this year marking the 60th anniversary of the Korean Armistice Agreement.
					
					Pomminryon earnestly appeals to all the Koreans to wipe out aggressors, chieftain of national division and root cause of all misfortunes, sufferings and war, and wage the variety of nationwide solidarity activities for supporting the conclusion of a peace treaty.
					
					We firmly believe that all the political parties, organizations and people from all walks of life in the north and the south and abroad desirous of peace and independent reunification of Korea will extend active support and solidarity to the patriotic call of Pomminryon.

articles.title: Meeting of Information Workers of Whole Army Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Information Workers of Whole Army Held
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting of information workers of the whole army took place at the April 25 House of Culture here Thursday.
					Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, guided the meeting.
					
					Attending the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Kyong Ok, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol and other KPA commanding officers. Political commissars of services and army corps and information workers of ground, naval, air and anti-air forces of the KPA, strategic rocket forces and military academies at all levels attended.
					
					KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, made a report.
					
					He said 80-odd year long history of the Korean revolutionary armed forces is associated with the undying revolutionary feats of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who, brought up the KPA to be the strongest in ideology by successfully embodying the Juche-based ideas and theories in the army building and activities.
					
					Thanks to the dear respected Supreme Commander, who regards it as his life-long mission to accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause and the cause of army-building, the cause of building the army of Juche has made dynamic advance to a new, higher stage, the reporter said.
					
					He called for conducting dynamic information and agitation work with an emphasis on instilling absolute trust in the party, the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the spirit of red flag, the spirit of devotedly defending the country and Kim Jong Il's patriotism into the hearts of service personnel as required by the new situation.
					
					There were speeches.
					
					Kim Jong Un made a speech.
					
					He said the organization of the meeting of information workers of the whole army including those of subunits, not military operational meeting, at a time when there created a touch-and-go situation due to the enemies' reckless saber-rattling is a demonstration of the steadfast faith and will of the WPK to win a decisive victory in the all-out action with the U.S. imperialists and their followers with the might of ideology.
					
					The KPA should conduct ideological work in field to suit the specific features of the army, he said, stressing the need for information workers to conduct it without ceremony and pattern by going among soldiers and arousing them to make pledge of loyalty in heights and trenches and turn out in the final decisive battle.
					
					He set forth tasks for conducting all the ideological work in the KPA as in wartime to meet the requirement of the situation in which the Korean Armistice Agreement is completely nullified and a fuse of a war is kindled as time has come to end the half a century-long all-out action with the U.S. imperialists. He indicated ways for doing so.
					
					Attaching importance to ideology is the consistent line of the building of the revolutionary armed forces, he said, adding that arms fully charged with ideology and faith will always win a victory. He expressed the belief that all information workers of the KPA will creditably discharge their noble mission and duty before the times and revolution and surely live up to the deep trust and high expectation of the party.

articles.title: DPRK Olympic Committee Meets
articles.content:
DPRK Olympic Committee Meets
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- An annual general meeting of the DPRK Olympic Committee took place on Thursday.

articles.title: National Technical Workshop on Turf Cultivation Held

articles.title: School Youth and Children's Study Tour Group Here
articles.content:
School Youth and Children's Study Tour Group Here
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A group of school youth and children from across the country for making a 1,000-ri (250 miles) journey for learning arrived here. It started to mark the 90th anniversary of 1,000-ri journey for learning made by President Kim Il Sung.
					Since its departure from Phophyong on March 16 the group arrived here by train on March 28 after it marched through Ogasan Pass to Kaechon via Hwaphyong, Kanggye, Jonchon and Hyangsan.
					
					Along the long route from Pyongyang Railway Station to Kwangbok Street and Mangyongdae, school youth and children and people warmly welcomed the members of the group with garlands.
					
					Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Ri Yong Su, department director of the C.C., WPK, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, and other officials concerned and officials of the youth league greeted the group members and marched together with them.

articles.title: Study Tour Group of Students Meets at Mangyongdae

Study Tour Group of Students Meets at Mangyongdae

articles.title: Taedonggang Building-materials Factory
articles.content:
Taedonggang Building-materials Factory
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Building-materials Factory makes a big contribution to ensuring modernization of construction in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					The streamlined factory has workshops for manufacturing blocks and plastic building materials.
					
					More than 10 kinds of blocks, made in the factory, are used for streets, roads, parks, areas along railroads, promenades, etc.
					
					Various kinds of lightweight steel structures lower steel consumption in construction, while raising bearing power of structures.
					
					The factory also turns out varieties of fashionable building fixtures.
					
					Jang Sung Il, an engineer of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					Up-to-date science and technologies have been applied to manufacturing plastic building materials.
					
					For example, glass fiber-added polypropylene plastic pipe (F-PPR) is one of the world's new inventions.
					
					The pipe is very useful for cold and hot water supply.
					
					Polyvinyl chloride (PVC) shuttering board is easy to process, highly resistant to erosion.
					
					It sharply increases both quality and speed of construction, as plastering is unnecessary when it is applied.
					
					It can be used for 30 to 50 times and renewable.
					
					The factory also mass-produces frames of metal roofs and foamed plastics.
					
					The factory strictly adheres to the credit-first principle in production and service.

articles.title: Recently Well-known Wolnae Islet in Korea
articles.content:
Recently Well-known Wolnae Islet in Korea
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Wolnae Islet is an outpost of the Korean People's Army, located in the biggest hotspot in the western sector of the front on the Korean Peninsula.
					This fact has been known to the world just after respected Marshal Kim Jong Un inspected the islet on March 11.
					
					His inspection of the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment, very near to Paekryong Island under the control of the south Korean forces, was made at the time when a touch-and-go situation was prevailing on the peninsula due to the U.S. and its followers' frantic war maneuvers for aggression on the DPRK.
					
					During his inspection tour, he acquainted himself with the troop deployment and targets of the south Korean forces on Paekryong Island, specifying the order of strike and density of fire to destroy the enemy's targets and ratifying new regulations for naval operation.
					
					He said that as the saying goes that a guy who is fond of playing with fire is bound to perish in flames, all the enemies quite often playing with fire in the sensitive hotspot should be thrown into a cauldron once he issues an order.
					
					He also told the commander of the detachment to photograph enemy's positions engulfed in flames and blown up during a battle and send pictures to the Supreme Command.
					
					Watching him on the islet and hearing this news on TV and radio, the DPRK servicepersons and civilians keenly felt that he is the peerlessly great man and the banner of victory. And they became firmly convinced of sure victory in the future great war for national reunification.
					
					That day Kim Jong Un showed loving care for the servicepersons and their families of the detachment, which gave vent to their deep reverence and trust in their supreme commander and encouraged them in an all-out action for finally concluding the showdown with the U.S. to victory.

articles.title: Leek Widely Used for Dishes in Korea
articles.content:
Leek Widely Used for Dishes in Korea
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Koreans have used for spring dishes various species of herbs good for health, including leek.
					Leek, a perennial plant, is regarded as a vegetable unique in taste and odor and it is cultivated between early spring and autumn.
					
					It contains 2.3% of protein, 0.51% of fat, vitamins A, B1, B2, C and much antibiotic.
					
					Leek can be taken in various forms of dishes and used as a bun stuffing. 
					
					Its seed is good for diuretic, leaves and stalks for stanching and bulb for diarrhea. Also leek is efficacious for curing gastroenteritis, bronchitis and nervous prostration.
					
					Korea has a long history of its cultivation
					
					According to books published in the period of the Koryo Dynasty (918-1392), kimchi made of leek had been considered one of the national memorial service's food. The plant has been cultivated in various localities with different names.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on DPRK's Will to Punish Provokers

Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK are trembling with towering anger at the U.S. and the south Korean military hooligans who dare insult the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and go desperate in their moves for confrontation and war.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korea for Taking Part in U.S. Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign

KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korea for Taking Part in U.S. Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppets are joining the U.S. in the anti-DPRK smear campaign, hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK over the "human rights" issue.

This is little short of inviting divine punishment.

This proves their bad behavior unbecoming to their duty and background in those countries, far away from national reconciliation, unity and reunification.

articles.title: No One Will Survive DPRK's Retaliatory Strike: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No One Will Survive DPRK's Retaliatory Strike: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will blow up the strongholds of aggression on the earth through precision strikes no matter where they are. 
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday warns this in a bylined article.
					
					The prevailing situation compels the army and people of the DPRK to make a courageous decision not to pardon the arrogant aggressors but wipe them out through decisive military counteractions.
					
					It is necessary to return fire for fire. If the aggressors brandish a nuclear stick, the Korean People's Army should react to them with a precision nuclear strike. It will reduce those enemies who talk about striking the "base of provocation and commanding forces" to ashes in a twinkle, not giving them a breathing spell.
					
					The U.S. imperialists and their followers had better take serious the capability of strategic missiles that can blow up any target at a single blow under any circumstances and the offensive spirit and might of the revolutionary armed forces who storm the enemy positions and destroy them at a lightning speed.
					
					The U.S. should not overestimate such weaponry as B-52. The KPA has already taken a military measure to counter it.
					
					The aggressors should not feel relieved for being in the mainland or on the other side of the ocean. Gone are the days when there was a verbal exchange.
					
					Not only the U.S. forces and south Korean puppet forces involved in the joint military exercises Foal Eagle but other countries hostile to the DPRK will not be able to escape merciless retaliatory strikes of the KPA.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S., S. Korea of Their Joint Operational Plan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S., S. Korea of Their Joint Operational Plan
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean authorities signed a "joint plan for countering the provocation of a local war" on March 22 under the pretext of coping with a "provocation" from the DPRK.
					The keynote of the war scenario called "joint operational plan" is that the south Korean puppet forces and the U.S. imperialist aggression forces would jointly counter the DPRK's "provocation of a local war."
					
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined commentary terms this a product of a dangerous conspiracy between the U.S. and south Korea to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					The new document for aggression worked out by them to expand the local war to an all-out war proves that the attempt of the warmongers at invading the DPRK went beyond the danger line to reach the war phase, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					A nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula has become an established fact.
					
					The above-said "plan" can serve as a fuse of a nuclear war.
					
					In actuality, the U.S. and the puppet warmongers are working hard to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					Short time ago, the U.S. let B-52 formation deployed in Anderson air force base on Guam and nuclear-powered submarine make sorties into the Korean Peninsula and opened to the public their drills unprecedentedly, kicking up war hysteria.
					
					The puppet forces are also going on the rampage, crying out for "striking the commanding forces, to say nothing of provocation base" while calling for "punishment."
					
					Their war hysteria has reached the phase of even revealing their thrice-cursed plot targeting the monuments to the immortality and to the achievements of the leaders erected in different parts of the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. and the puppet forces should clearly know that they can never frighten the DPRK with such "plan."
					
					Their "plan" would only precipitate their final ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Punishing Provocateurs
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Punishing Provocateurs
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- It is the legitimate right of the DPRK to punish all warmongers crazy in their moves for provocation and war and start a final decisive battle for achieving the country's reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article.
					It goes on:
					
					The service personnel and the people of the DPRK who are stronger in independent faith and regard the dignity dearer than their own lives will never allow their dignity to be infringed upon.
					
					The U.S. utterly indifferent to international law and convention on sovereignty is mobilizing "its three major nuclear strike means" in a bid to invade the DPRK and realize the ambition to dominate it. This is an open nuclear blackmail against it.
					
					Shortly ago, the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea signed a "joint plan to cope with the provocation of a local war" drafted by south Korean military gangsters, giving assurances that should the puppet army commit a military provocation, all  the U.S. forces in the mainland and the Pacific would be involved in an all-out nuclear war, using it as a pretext. 
					
					The south Korean hooligans, encouraged by the backing of the U.S. master, are kicking up war hysteria, crying out for "a ten-fold punishment." Not content with this, they are making no scruple of hatching a thrice-cursed plot to bring down statues of great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the symbol of the supreme dignity of the DPRK.
					
					Such reckless actions are an intolerable insult to the army and the people of the DPRK who regard the supreme dignity dearer than their own lives.
					
					Gone are days when there was a verbal exchange. Now is the time to finally settle accounts with the aggressors who dare hurt the sovereignty and the supreme dignity of the country and pose a threat to the nation's destiny, and put a definite end to the history of politically-motivated military provocations and tension on this land.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Party Calls for Waging Activities for Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Party Calls for Waging Activities for Peace against War
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Unified Progressive Party of south Korea in its special resolution on March 23 announced that it would wage no-war activities for peace.
					Now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is critical situation, the worst one after the June 25 Korean war, the resolution noted, urging the U.S. not to engage in "sanctions" and military pressure on the north any more but opt for dialogue with it.
					
					It demanded the present "government" in south Korea immediately stop the conspiratorial racket of eliminating "forces following the north".
					
					It said that groups for realizing peace against war will be formed across south Korea launch practical actions to remove the atmosphere of confrontation and danger of war on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Accuse S. Korean Regime of Suppressing Peace Movement
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Accuse S. Korean Regime of Suppressing Peace Movement
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia issued a statement on March 20 denouncing the south Korean puppet regime for its fascist suppression of the progressive forces' movement for peace against war.
					The statement accused the puppet regime of staging the madcap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises against the north in league with the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and, at the same time, kicking up a terror-ridden repressive racket against the progressive forces opposed to the "resolution on sanctions" against the north and the north-targeted war exercises, again labeling them "forces following the north."
					
					It went on:
					
					The progressive forces are strongly demanding the U.S. and south Korean warmongers halt the war moves against the north and come out for dialogue and opt for concluding a peace treaty, holding that "sanctions would not help settle the situation" and "the on-going military exercises are offensive ones aimed to attack the north."
					
					Their actions are an expression of resentment against the puppet regime keen to ignite a war against the north in league with the U.S., and quite natural and just ones for peace and stability in view of the grave situation where all mechanisms to prevent a war have been scrapped and a war may break out any moment on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					Nevertheless, the ultra-right conservative forces are cracking down upon those people of conscience out in the movement against sanctions and a war, labeling them "forces following the north." This is a crime against the nation and a fascist action as it is aimed to stamp out the forces for the movement for national reunification and organizations for the movement for peace against war and escalate the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					All Korean nationals in Russia will positively support the south Korean people's struggle for peace against war and make all efforts to frustrate the desperate moves of the south Korean regime to create the danger of war and escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces.

articles.title: GIs' Crimes Rampant in S. Korea: News Analyst
articles.content:
GIs' Crimes Rampant in S. Korea: News Analyst
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- All sorts of GI crimes are becoming more frequent in south Korea, bringing greater misfortune and pain to its people. 
					At least 2 000 cases of crimes have been committed by the U.S.  imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea over the last five years.
					
					The number of crimes committed by them in 2009 is 64.2 percent higher than that in the previous year.
					
					According to data made public by the south Korean puppet Police Agency, GIs committed nearly 400 cases of various crimes such as violence, robbery and rape in 2010 alone.
					
					The puppet Ministry of Justice deplored that traffic accidents caused by GIs reached 165 cases in 2011 but their number increased to 166 in the first half of 2012.
					
					There were 319 high-profile crimes committed by GIs in Kyonggi Province alone from 2010 to the end of August in 2012.
					
					South Korea has turned into a horrible society under the reign of GIs crimes. This is a natural product of the pro-U.S. sycophantic policy of the puppet regime.
					
					The U.S.-south Korea "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA) is an unequal agreement as it grants all sorts of privileges to the U.S. forces characterized by extreme arrogance and brutality.
					
					On the strength of SOFA GIs are strutting in south Korea even after committing thrice-cursed crimes against humanity as they enjoy extraterritorial rights.
					
					Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities are blustering that "any action may hurt the feelings of the U.S." and "it may damage the alliance", letting GI criminals go unpunished. On the contrary, they are suppressing those people who turn out in anti-U.S. actions in demand of the U.S. forces' pullback and abrogation of SOFA, terming them "forces following the north".
					
					They make no scruple of resorting to such acts of treachery as sharply increasing the upkeep of the U.S. troops and offering the cradle of people as their military bases.
					
					All facts go to prove that south Koreans can never get rid of their misfortune and pain unless the puppet regime's pro-U.S. acts are brought to an end and the U.S. forces pulled out of south Korea.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Brazil

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated by Organization of DR Congo

articles.title: Beninese Party Denounces UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
Beninese Party Denounces UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Benin on Mar. 21 made public a statement in denunciation of the unjust "resolution on sanctions" of the UN Security Council against the DPRK.

articles.title: Norwegian King Hopes for Development of Friendly Relations with DPRK

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Seminar Support Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Seminar Support Korean People's Just Cause
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The 17th seminar of world political parties on the building of a new society took place in Mexico from March 14 to 16. 
					Present at the seminar were delegations and delegates of at least 80 political parties and organizations from 35 countries of Asia, Africa and Latin America including the DPRK and members of the leadership and delegates of the Workers' Party of Mexico.
					
					Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, said in his opening address that the DPRK's third underground nuclear test was the most just step for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation from the evermore undisguised moves of the U.S. and its allies to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					Delegates of political parties and organizations of various countries including the DPRK called upon the progressive parties and organizations to support and solidarize one another and launch joint actions against the U.S. political and military interference in the countries desirous of building a new society. 
					
					The seminar adopted a joint statement in support of the just cause of the Korean people to defend the sovereignty of the country and the nation. 
					
					The statement said that all the participants in the seminar unanimously expressed full support and solidarity with the just and heroic struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people in their dynamic advance for final victory, holding aloft the banner of independence and Songun. 
					
					It went on:
					
					The U.S. and its allies are frantically kicking up rackets of international sanctions and pressure against the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test for self-defence. This is an extremely dangerous hostile act to stifle socialist Korea and a provocation gravely threatening peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					The reality clearly proves what a just option the heroic Korean people took under the wise leadership of the WPK to bolster the war deterrence in every way to defend security of the country and the nation, bravely frustrating all the challenges and ordeals. 
					
					The WPK and the Korean people closely united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un are firmly defending socialism centered on the popular masses and victoriously pushing forward the building of a thriving nation with the might of Songun. Their heroic struggle instills great confidence and courage into the progressive political parties and people in their efforts to build a new society. 
					
					Noting that the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War (Korean War) is a holiday not only for them but also for all other progressives, the statement called upon the progressive political parties, organizations and people of different countries to celebrate the anniversary with splendor as a grand international political festival. 
					
					It urged the U.S. and its allies to immediately lift all the unjust sanctions against the DPRK and stop at once the reckless military provocations threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia. 
					
					The national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico on behalf of all the participants presented a letter to Kim Jong Un as regards the successful seminar.

articles.title: Magazine Paektu-Halla Issued
articles.content:
Magazine Paektu-Halla Issued
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released the March issue of its magazine Paektu-Halla.

Also seen on the magazine is an article titled "Warm congratulations to heroes who contributed to the successful third underground nuclear test".

Conveyed in it is news that 53 peace movement organizations of at least 20 countries and 530 international peace champions and personages published urgent joint statements in this regard.

articles.title: Japan's Intention in Whaling Disclosed: News Analyst
articles.content:
Japan's Intention in Whaling Disclosed: News Analyst
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Minister of Agriculture, Forest and Fisheries of Japan when interviewed by AFP said Japan will never stop whaling.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige reunion de funcionarios de propaganda de todo el ejercito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige reunion de funcionarios de propaganda de todo el ejercito
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la reunion de los funcionarios de propaganda de todo el ejercito bajo la guia del Mariscal     Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En la ocasion participaron Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Kyong Ok, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol y otros comandantes del EPC, los comisarios politicos de ejercitos de varios tipos y cuerpos, los funcionarios de propaganda del EPC, incluyendo las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas y de cohetes estrategicos y las academias militares a distintos niveles del EPC.
					
					El informe de la reunion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El informante senalo que en la historia de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea de mas de 80 anos, estan registradas las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes formaron el EPC como poderoso ejercito en la idea materializando con brillantez en la construccion del ejercito y actividades militares la autoctona ideologia.
					
					Subrayo que gracias al Comandante Supremo, quien considero como la mision de toda su vida llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Songun y la de fundacion del ejercito de los Generalisimos, la autoctona causa de construccion del ejercito avanza con firmeza en el nuevo nivel.
					
					Destaco que conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo, todos los funcionarios de propaganda deben desplegar con osadia su labor para infundir profundamente en el corazon de los oficiales y soldados del EPC la fe absoluta en el partido, el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider y a la patria, el de bandera roja y el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il.
					
					En la ocasion hubo intervenciones.
					
					El Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un pronuncio el discurso.
					
					El dijo que bajo la situacion tan inminente creada por la imprudente campana de guerra de los enemigos, organizo no la reunion de operacion militar sino la reunion de los funcionarios de  propaganda de todo el ejercito en que toman parte hasta los funcionarios de las subunidades, lo cual deviene la demostracion de la invariable conviccion y voluntad del PTC de lograr la victoria decisiva en el enfrentamiento total contra el imperialismo norteamericano y sus fuerzas seguidoras.
					
					El EPC debe desplegar de manera combativa todas las labores ideologicas, dijo y prosiguio que los funcionarios de propaganda deben desarrollar, libre de costumbre y formula, las labores ideologicas  en la practica agitante  con el mismo temple de trabajo politico en el campo de batalla, con  el cual habian exhortado con vigor a los combatientes en las cotas y trincheras a tomar el juramento de fidelidad y movilizarse en la batalla decisiva final.
					
					Presento las tareas y los remedios para acercar al borde de guerra todas las labores ideologicas dentro del EPC conforme a la demanda de la situacion en que se invalido completamente el acuerdo de armisticio y se encendio la mecha de guerra en este momento en que hay de acabar  con el enfrentamiento total contra los imperialistas yanquis que perduraba mas de medio siglo.
					
					Dar prioridad a la ideologia es la invariable linea de construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y los fusiles cargados de la idea y la conviccion siempre salen victoriosos, senalo y expreso la conviccion de que todos los funcionarios de propaganda del EPC responderan sin falta a la elevada confianza y esperanza del PTC al cumplir excelentemente su sagrada mision y deberes asumidos ante la epoca y la revolucion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma foto con los participantes en reunion de funcionarios de propaganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma foto con los participantes en reunion de funcionarios de propaganda
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo el dia 28 fotos de recuerdo con los participantes en la reunion de los funcionarios de propaganda de todo el ejercito.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de Alberto Anaya Gutierrez

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion anual de Comite Olimpico de RPDC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion anual de Comite Olimpico de RPDC
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves la reunion anual del Comite Olimpico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Participaron en el conclave los miembros del citado comite y los funcionarios del dominio deportivo y otros concernientes.

					Hubo el informe de Ri Jong Mu, ministro de Deportes y presidente del Comite Olimpico, e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un presto profunda atencion al desarrollo deportivo del pais y tomo las medidas estatales y dispenso benevolencias a los deportistas quienes glorificaron el honor de la patria.
					
					Destacaron la necesidad de quedar fieles a la direccion del Mariscal y elevar definitivamente en el presente ano la funcion y papel del comite olimpico y las asociaciones de respectivas disciplinas en acato al grandioso proyecto del Mariscal en materia de construccion de la potencia deportiva y registrar un gran viraje en la labor deportiva del pais concentrando las fuerzas al desarrollo de las tecnicas por disciplinas a estilo coreano.

articles.title: APRP declara voluntad de nacion coreana de preservar paz
articles.content:
APRP declara voluntad de nacion coreana de preservar paz
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Las Direcciones Nortena, Surena y Ultramarina de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) hicieron publica el dia 28 una declaracion conjunta como sigue:
					Debido a las "resoluciones de sancion" fabricadas injustamente por Estados Unidos y las fuerzas seguidoras y a sus ejercicios de guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en la Peninsula Coreana se ha creado una situacion tan critica que nadie sabe cuando estallaria la guerra nuclear.
					
					Como es conocido por el interior y exterior del pais, el lanzamiento del satelite de la RPDC conviene totalmente a la ley internacional sobre el uso pacifico del cosmos y conquistarlo es un justo derecho de todos los Estados soberanos.
					
					Tambien, la prueba nuclear subterranea de la RPDC es una justa medida autodefensiva para defender la soberania del pais y la nacion y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana frente a las maniobras persistentes de EE.UU. y las fuerzas seguidoras para aislarla y aplastarla y a la amenaza nuclear mas abierta.
					
					Es ilogico que EE.UU. puede realizar a su antojo la prueba nuclear, lanzar misiles y amenazar con las armas nucleares a otros, en tanto, la RPDC no puede realizarlos con fines pacificos y en el marco autodefensivo.
					
					De mal en peor, aplicar la "sancion" bajo tal pretexto es una flagrante violacion a la soberania y la dignidad de un Estados soberano y un desafio a la ley internacional.
					
					Esto es una demostracion de la naturaleza bandidesca de EE.UU. acostumbrado a aplastar con armas nucleares a otro que se le considera como un obstaculo en realizar su heguemonia mundial.
					
					Los ejercicios militares conjuntos que se desarrollan con frenesi en el cielo, la tierra y el mar del Sur de Corea con la movilizacion de gran cantidad de los medios de ataque nuclear deviene el juego de fuego nuclear para exterminar a la nacion coreana al juzgar su caracter, dimension y contenido.
					
					Por las maniobras imprudentes de EE.UU. y las fuerzas belicosas de la capa militar del Sur, fue invalido el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea y todos los acuerdos de no agresion Norte-Sur fueron anulados, de manera que la Peninsula Coreana esta al borde de la guerra nuclear.
					
					Traduciendo la voluntad de la nacion de frustrar rotundamente las imprudentes maniobras de guerra de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion del interior y exterior del pais y salvaguardar la paz, las tres Direcciones de la APRP declaran como sigue:
					
					Las fuerzas belicosas de EE.UU. y del Sur de Corea deben poner fin a sus ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC que imponen a la nacion coreana una catastrofe nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. debe conocer bien que las armas nucleares ya no son monopolio suyo.
					
					En la situacion como ahora en que ambas partes beligerantes tienen armas nucleares, si volviera a estallarse la guerra en este suelo por el accidental choque militar, esto seria la guerra nuclear incomparable con la de la decada de 1950 y no estara salvo tampoco EE.UU. situado al otro lado del oceano.
					
					Todos los coreanos aspirantes al futuro radiante de la nacion deben levantarse unanimemente en la lucha contra la imprudente campana del entrenamiento belico de agresion al Norte de Corea de EE.UU. y las fuerzas belicistas militares del Sur de Corea encaminada a devastar el territorio patrio e imponer desastres nucleares a la nacion coreana.
					
					EE.UU. y las fuerzas satelites tienen que retirar de inmediato la injusta "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU sobre el Norte de Corea.
					
					En la Peninsula Coreana son inaceptables los actos bandidescos como que EE.UU. fabricaba la "resolucion de sancion" abusando de la ONU y provocaba la guerra tomandola como pretexto.
					
					La nacion coreana ya no es pais debil del pasado y esta tierra es diferente a los paises que sufrieron humillacion doblegandose ante la amenaza nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. debe ver exactamente la realidad y pedir disculpas por orquestar su farsa de "sancion".
					
					!Que desarrollen con dinamismo todos los coreanos internos y externos del pais el movimiento masivo por concertar el tratado de paz este ano cuando se cumple 60 anos de la firma del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea!
					
					La APRP exhorta ardientemente a todos los coreanos internos y externos del pais a desplegar fuertemente como movimiento pannacional variados actos comunes y actividades solidarias para extirpar de este suelo las fuerzas foraneas, causa de la guerra que continua la division de la nacion coreana e impone solo la desgracia y sufrimiento de toda indole, y demandar la concertacion del tratado de paz.
					
					Expresamos la firme conviccion de que todos los partidos politicos, entidades y las personalidades de distintos estratos que aspiran a la paz y la reunificacion independiente del pais, enviaran el activo apoyo y la solidaridad con este llamamiento patriotico de la APRP.

articles.title: Fabrica de Materiales de Construccion Taedonggang
articles.content:
Fabrica de Materiales de Construccion Taedonggang
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Fabrica de Materiales de Construccion Taedonggang de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea garantiza en alto nivel con sus productos la modernizacion de la construccion.
					Alli hay los talleres de losa, materiales plasticos de construccion, etc. y todos los procesos de produccion son computarizados.
					
					El edificio de la fabrica fue erguido por el metodo de construccion que deviene ahora una tendencia mundial.
					
					Los bloques de mas de 10 tipos como el para avenida, el para dique se emplean eficazmente en todas las partes como la avenida, aldea, parque, linea del ferrocarril y rios.
					
					La estructura de acero producida en distintos tamanos y formas segun el diseno es solida, ligera y simple en su instalacion y se conecta facilmente con otra.
					
					Por eso, si lo aplican, pueden ahorrar los materiales de acero necesarios al proceso de construccion y elevar la capacidad de apoyo de la estructura de acero.
					
					Este producto se usa en los edificios industriales de un piso, pero en futuro se aplicara tambien en los edificios de varios pisos.
					
					Por otra parte, los materiales de construccion de vidrio, resina sintetica, los termicos y los demas comunes y los materiales de acabado en construccion contribuyen a realizar el caracter plastico y artistico en la edificacion.
					
					Jang Sung Il (31 anos de edad), ingeniero de la fabrica citado por la ACNC dijo que los materiales plasticos de construccion en que se aplicaron la ciencia y tecnica ultramodernas merecen alarde en su calidad y prosiguio:
					
					Por ejemplo, el tubo plastico F-PPR comenzo a desarrollarse y usarse recientemente en la escala mundial.
					
					Este producto es muy ideal gracias a tener buena resistencia a la presion, baja proporcion de transformacion por calor y bajo precio.
					
					La tabla de madera PVC es de mucha duracion en comparacion con las maderas comunes.
					
					La plancha del encofrado con superficie lustrosa no necesita el proceso de repello, promueve a la vez a elevar la calidad y velocidad de construccion. 
					
					Pueden emplearla 30-50 veces.
					
					Ademas la fabrica produce mucha cantidad de materiales prefabricados y basicos que usan en la rama.
					
					Segun la demanda de los compradores, ofrece el servicio general desde el diseno hasta la construccion.
					
					Realizar la produccion, administracion y servicio perfectos en el principio de dar prioridad al credito y la diversificacion de las variedades, esto es el objetivo fijado por los obreros de esta empresa.

articles.title: CRPP critica permanencia de Kim Kwan Jin en cargo de ministro de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea

CRPP critica permanencia de Kim Kwan Jin en cargo de ministro de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea
